title: April Fools
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Ruby might’ve hurt Ruby’s fingers….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eeh!? Are you okay!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>There are band-aids in the clubroom’s first aid kit…. Can Ruby use one?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Sure, I’ll put it on you. Hmm, band-aid….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Huh, the little chicken band-aid that everyone picked last time is gone<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Eeh!? A-, already!? But, we’ve just put them in the other day though? The band-aid with little chickens marching and holding instruments…. Is already gone... ? No way….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Just kidding, it was a lie. There are still a bunch left<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>G-, geez! You’re so cruel, to lie like that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>What are you saying Ruby, you’re lying about being injured too so you can use one of the chicken band-aids, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Uu…., I’m sorry….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>In exchange, I’ll give you this<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Look, it’s a rabbit with demon wings band-aid! Fuh…. There’s no doubt that your magic power will increase<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>It’s fine even if it doesn’t increase Ruby’s magic power, it’s really cute! Let’s do a trade with Ruby’s hamster band-aid!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
